items.summary: Update the backend data model to support an optional image attachment on community board posts and moderation requests by adding an `image : ?Storage.ExternalBlob` field to `ModeratedContent`, `Post`, and (if applicable for editing) `PostEdit`.

Extend the backend moderation submission flow so community board image attachments are accepted and stored: update `createModerationRequest` to accept an additional `image : ?Storage.ExternalBlob` parameter (alongside `video`) and persist it on the moderation request.
Extend the backend moderation approval flow so approved posts retain image attachments: update `approveModerationRequest` to copy the moderation requestâ€™s `image` field into the created `Post`.

Fix the Community Board create-post mutation to actually send the selected image to the backend: update `useCreatePost` (in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts`) to construct an `ExternalBlob` from the selected image bytes and call the updated `createModerationRequest` with the `image` argument.
Render approved post image attachments in the Community Board feed by displaying `PostImageAttachment` when a post includes an image field.
